note: All counts are from ClinicalTrials.gov as of the snapshot date. Numbers may change as new trials are registered.

total_ev_condition.query: "extracellular vesicle" OR "extracellular vesicles" OR exosome OR exosomes

total_ev_interventional.query: "extracellular vesicle" OR "extracellular vesicles" OR exosome OR exosomes

cardiac_plus_ev.query: ("extracellular vesicle" OR exosome OR exosomes) AND (cardiac OR myocardial OR "heart failure")

neurodegeneration_plus_ev.query: ("extracellular vesicle" OR exosome OR exosomes) AND (neurodegeneration OR Alzheimer OR Parkinson OR "amyotrophic lateral sclerosis" OR dementia)
neurodegeneration_plus_ev.manuscript_note: Manuscript reports 17 (correct at time of original query). Increased to 24 by snapshot date — 7 new trials registered between original manuscript query and this snapshot.

tumor_metastasis_plus_ev_narrow.query: ("extracellular vesicle" OR exosome OR exosomes) AND (metastasis OR metastatic)
tumor_metastasis_plus_ev_narrow.note: This narrower query matches the manuscript's reported count of 23. Uses metastasis/metastatic terms only, consistent with the paper's tumor metastasis context definition.

tumor_metastasis_plus_ev_broad.query: ("extracellular vesicle" OR exosome OR exosomes) AND (cancer OR tumor OR metastasis OR metastatic)
tumor_metastasis_plus_ev_broad.note: Broader query including all cancer/tumor terms. Not used in manuscript — provided for reference.

pathway_targeted.query: ("extracellular vesicle" OR exosome OR exosomes) AND (integrin OR "TGF-beta" OR autophagy)
pathway_targeted.note: Both trials are observational, not interventional. Zero interventional trials target these priority pathways in an EV context.

representative_trials_cardiac.title: Silent Myocardial Ischemia in Patients Undergoing Non-oncological Abdominal Surgeries
Role of Exosomes Derived From Epicardial Fat in Atrial Fibrillation
Differential Expression and Analysis of Peripheral Plasma Exosome miRNA in Patients With Myocardial Infarction
representative_trials_cardiac.sponsor: Xinhua Hospital, Shanghai Jiao Tong University

representative_trials_cardiac.title: Early Detection of Autoimmune Thyroid Heart Disease Via Urinary Exosomal Proteins
Extracellular Vesicle Micro RNA Profiling in Congenital Heart Disease

representative_trials_neurodegeneration.title: Identifying Biomarkers in ALS Patients Using Neuronal Derived Extracellular Vesicles
Brain Insulin Resistance Index in Plasma Neuronal Exosomes As Predictive Biomarkers of Alzheimer's Disease
Combined Aerobic Exercise and Cognitive Training for Alzheimer's Disease Prevention — Exosomal Synaptic Proteins
Patients With ALS and Other Motor Disorders Treated With Mesenchymal Cell Exosome Solution
representative_trials_neurodegeneration.sponsor: The Foundation for Orthopaedics and Regenerative Medicine

representative_trials_neurodegeneration.title: hUC-MSC-sEV-001 Nasal Drops for the Treatment of Multiple Neurodegenerative Diseases

representative_trials_tumor_metastasis.title: A Multimodal Liquid Biopsy-Based Assay as a Pre-Screening Test Before LDCT for Lung Cancer Screening
A Pilot Study of Tumor-Derived Exosomes as Diagnostic and Prognostic Markers in Breast Cancer
Consistency Analysis of PD-L1s in NSCLC Tissues and in Plasma Exosomes Before and After Radiotherapy
Exosome-derived Extrahepatic Metastasis Detection By Liquid Biopsy In Colorectal Cancer Liver Metastases
Plasma Exosomes Combined With Multi-omics Analysis for Targeted Therapy Resistance in EGFR Mutation Lung Adenocarcinoma
representative_trials_tumor_metastasis.sponsor: Union Hospital, Tongji Medical College, Huazhong University

pathway_targeted_trials.title: An Observation Study of Exosome Proteomics Released From Cardiopulmonary Organs and Hemodynamic Parameters in Sepsis
pathway_targeted_trials.note: Autophagy listed as condition; not a direct EV-pathway interventional trial.

pathway_targeted_trials.title: Identification of New Diagnostic Protein Markers for Colorectal Cancer in Circulating Tumor Exosomes
pathway_targeted_trials.note: CRC exosome biomarker study; pathway keyword match is incidental.

NCT05669144.title: Co-transplantation of Mesenchymal Stem Cell Derived Exosomes and Autologous Mitochondria for Patients Candidate for CABG Surgery With EF<25%
NCT05669144.intervention: Intracoronary and intra-myocardial injection of UC-MSC-derived exosomes and/or autologous mitochondria during CABG
NCT05669144.design: 4 arms: exosomes only (n=5), mitochondria only (n=5), exosomes+mitochondria (n=5), placebo (n=5)
NCT05669144.relevance: Most advanced interventional EV trial in cardiac repair. Directly relevant to the paper's negative-space priority for Integrin/Src and cardiac contexts.

NCT06607900.title: hUC-MSC-sEV-001 Nasal Drops for the Treatment of Multiple Neurodegenerative Diseases
primary_outcomes: Disease-specific cognitive/functional scales at 6-12 months (ADAS-Cog for AD, MDS-UPDRS for PD, UMSARS for MSA, ADCS-CGIC for DLB, CDR+NACC for FTD, ALSFRS-R for ALS)
NCT06607900.location: Xuanwu Hospital, Capital Medical University, Beijing, China
NCT06607900.relevance: Largest planned EV-based interventional trial in neurodegeneration. Basket design covers 6 neurodegenerative diseases. Directly relevant to the paper's finding that neurodegeneration EV research is growing but clinical translation lags.

manuscript_consistency_notes.neurodegeneration_ev: 24 — matches manuscript (updated from earlier draft value of 17)
manuscript_consistency_notes.metastasis_ev_narrow: 23 — matches manuscript (narrow query: metastasis OR metastatic)
manuscript_consistency_notes.metastasis_ev_broad: 133 — broader cancer/tumor/metastasis query, not used in manuscript
manuscript_consistency_notes.pathway_targeted: 2 (both observational) — matches manuscript claim of near-absence
